actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry.

official_title: A bill to provide for the establishment and maintenance of a reserve inventory of wheat, feed grains, and soybeans.

summary.text: Grain and Soybean Reserve Act -- Requires the Secretary of Agriculture to establish a separate reserve of inventories of wheat, feed grain, and soybeans. Specifies quantities and methods of building such reserves. Authorizes the Secretary to dispose of reserved commodities: (1) to relieve distress in areas affected by acute unemployment, major disaster, or civil defense emergency; and (2) to assist in preserving and maintaining foundation herds of cattle, sheep, and goats.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the establishment and maintenance of a reserve inventory of wheat, feed grains, and soybeans.
